name: RE: WholeTale (An RPG Maker Undertale AU)
name_original: RE: WholeTale (An RPG Maker Undertale AU)
description:
>Main Story: Can one change fate?

Welcome to WholeTale.

An UnderTale AU where everything went wrong due to a Genocide Route that couldn't be aborted.

Now everything is on a permanent cycle... That someone will not allow.

But you (controlling Frisk) are ready to do something to save everything and everyone in your world from being returned to zero.

Will You and the ones who join you have the chance of bending fate?

Or is it already set in stone?

>Ex Chapter: Does one choose what to do?... Or is it given purpose by someone else?

Be in the eyes of Prometheus.

A paradox clone who was sent to a different timeline in the same universe.

Forced to do something they aren't even aware of what it is.

Everything is up to them now.

Will they do what it is expected to do?

Or will they choose a different outcome?
